item.title: Mevlbkxshp Powershell Script Malware Analysis
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction Mevlbkxshp is a PowerShell script categorized as a dropper. This malware has many features, most of which are obfuscation techniques and some properties that make it semi-fileless.
